name: Hidden Moves
description:
In Hidden Moves you play as Mr. Honey. The Interstellar Andromedarean Highschool's Principal who cannot believe prom's already here. THIS IS IT.  It is his last chance to earn the respect of his students. 

It seems luck's on his side because the tunes that are being played have a wonderful beat drop every 10 seconds. A great opportunity to show his hidden skills and kill it on the dancefloor. It's time to shine! Will you help him?"

Made for Ludum Dare 51  with the theme Every 10 seconds
